CONFIDENCE: Medium
objects.pattern: [(email-message:subject = 'New modifications to the specification' AND email-message:from_ref.value = 'attacker@example.com' AND (email-message:to_refs[*].value = 'victim1@target.com' OR email-message:to_refs[*].value = 'victim2@target.com')) AND ((email-message:body_multipart[*].body_raw_ref.hashes.MD5 = 'd41d8cd98f00b204e9800998ecf8427e' OR email-message:body_multipart[*].body_raw_ref.hashes.ssdeep = 'cf83e1357eefb8bdf1542850d66d8007d620e4050b5715dc83f4a921d36ce9ce47d0d13c5d85f2b0ff8318d2877eec2f63b931bd47417a81a538327af927da3e' OR email-message:body_multipart[*].body_raw_ref.hashes.MD5 = 'd41d8cd98f00b204e9800998ecf8427e' OR email-message:body_multipart[*].body_raw_ref.hashes.'SHA-1' = 'da39a3ee5e6b4b0d3255bfef95601890afd80709' OR email-message:body_multipart[*].body_raw_ref.hashes.'SHA-256' = 'e3b0c44298fc1c149afbf4c8996fb92427ae41e4649b934ca495991b7852b855') AND (email-message:body_multipart[*].body_raw_ref.name = 'File Name' AND email-message:body_multipart[*].body_raw_ref.parent_directory_ref.path = 'Path/to/File') AND email-message:body_multipart[*].body_raw_ref.size = 134123)]

[(file:hashes.MD5 = 'd41d8cd98f00b204e9800998ecf8427e' OR file:hashes.ssdeep = 'cf83e1357eefb8bdf1542850d66d8007d620e4050b5715dc83f4a921d36ce9ce47d0d13c5d85f2b0ff8318d2877eec2f63b931bd47417a81a538327af927da3e' OR file:hashes.MD5 = 'd41d8cd98f00b204e9800998ecf8427e' OR file:hashes.'SHA-1' = 'da39a3ee5e6b4b0d3255bfef95601890afd80709' OR file:hashes.'SHA-256' = 'e3b0c44298fc1c149afbf4c8996fb92427ae41e4649b934ca495991b7852b855') AND (file:name = 'File Name' AND file:parent_directory_ref.path = 'Path/to/File') AND file:size = 134123]
